name: Delete Export Report P Invoice after Cancel
script:
po_doc = frappe.get_doc("Purchase Invoice", doc.purchase_invoice)
doc.db_set("purchase_invoice", None)
if po_doc.docstatus == 1: 
    po_doc.cancel()
po_doc.delete()
